alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cerro Gordo County including Mason City through 530 AM CDT... At 423 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mason City, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of one to two inches. Locally higher amounts are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mason City Municipal Airport around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mason City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
